docTitle.titlePart:
Filtration Trials with SAFC
®
EX-CELL
®
CD Hydrolysate Fusion

byline.docAuthor:
Mandar Dixit
1
, Zachary Deeds
2
, Geneane Walsh
1 and Christopher Sullivan
1
,

front.address: 2909 Laclede Avenue, Saint Louis, MO 63103, USA
front.div:
Abstract
SAFC has recently launched EX-CELL CD Hydrolysate
Fusion, the first fully chemically defined media
supplement of its kind in the industry. Sartorius
Stedim Biotech and SAFC have recently announced
a wide-ranging joint cooperation agreement to serve
their customers. As a consequence of this effort, a
range of 0.2 μm and 0.1 μm sterilizing grade filters
from different membrane materials were tested for
throughput and biological activity post-filtration.
